description: Halloween is a time for candy, costumes, and of course spooky drinks! This Halloween Punch&nbsp;cocktail recipe is sure to be a hit with your guests. It's easy to make too. All you need are some simple ingredients that you probably already have in your kitchen.
name: Halloween Alcoholic Punch
recipeIngredient: 64 oz. Apple juice or apple cider
Other garnish ideas: candy eyeballs, plastic spiders, gummy worms, etc.

recipeInstructions.name: In a large punch bowl, combine all the ingredients. Stir well until combined.
recipeInstructions.text: In a large punch bowl, combine all the ingredients. Stir well until combined.

recipeInstructions.name: Add some dry ice (optional) to create a smoking effect to the punch.
recipeInstructions.text: Add some dry ice (optional) to create a smoking effect to the punch.
